solution_line_template: If each token is worth ${token_value}, then ${worth_less_dollars} worth of tokens is ${worth_less_dollars}/${token_value} = <<{worth_less_dollars}/{token_value}={worth_less_tokens}>>{worth_less_tokens} tokens
Angus has {worth_less_tokens} tokens less than Elsa who has {elsa_tokens} so Angus has {elsa_tokens}-{worth_less_tokens} = <<{elsa_tokens}-{worth_less_tokens}={angus_tokens}>>{angus_tokens} tokens
